snippet: We’re back for another full day of N.C.A.A. men’s tournament games. The New York Times has reporters fanned out across the country for comprehensive coverage.
lead_paragraph: We’re back for another full day of N.C.A.A. men’s tournament games. The New York Times has reporters fanned out across the country for comprehensive coverage.

headline.main: Day 2 of Live March Madness Coverage Begins
headline.print_headline: No. 14 Seed Georgia State Upsets No. 3 Seed Baylor
